main.name: Meru Smitas
main.descriptionEnd: Helping companies with their web needs
main.bio: I have gained 3+ years of full-time frontend experience in the pharma agency 28b. I developed multiple web/iOS solutions, internal tools, and marketing materials for clients. In another similar role I created and maintained a static and interactive website. Prior to these roles I was studying an MSc and a BSc Computer Science at London Universities. I launched frontend dev hub channel to share my experience and improve my teamwork skills. I am looking to work with front-end technologies. I have experience in HTML, SCSS, JS and React.js. In addition, I have been following clientsâ€™ requirements created on Adobe applications, such as, InDesign, XD and Powerpoint. Over 13 years in IT environment I built a wide range of skills that could benefit your company.

work.title: Junior Developer

Implementing responsive emails including CRM, Salesforce and iPad Implementing internal tools that helped to increase the quality of the software and made the delivery processes faster. Using Code Standard guidelines and best engineering practices such as Code reviews, Git branching strategy, and CI/CD. Using Agile practices. Improving internal documentation (Company Wiki).
